company_goal: Purpose and objectives of 'ZARBDOR ELEVATOR' JSC
shareholders_meeting: Results of the general meeting of shareholders

not_found.message: Page not found. Maybe the address is incorrect?

contact.description: By maintaining full control over our products, we provide our clients with the best quality prices and services.
contact.name: Your name

footer.contact_text: If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact our team.
footer.address: 2307 Beverley Rd, Brooklyn, New York 11226, USA.

ctaBanner.title: Experience
ctaBanner.desc: Thanks to 20 years of experience and a scientific-technical approach, we ensure stable growth and high-quality products in the grain market.

fancyBoxItems.title: Strong Strategy:
fancyBoxItems.desc: Our factories meet high safety and quality standards and have international certifications.

fancyBoxItems.title: Award-Winning Experience:
fancyBoxItems.desc: We have experience in overcoming unexpected risks and challenges in global supply chains.

fancyBoxItems.title: Accurate Inspection:
fancyBoxItems.desc: We ensure testing and quality through the latest technologies, backed by decades of experience.

bannerLayout5.heading: We Are Ready – To Meet the Demand for Grain Products
bannerLayout5.contentText: The global need for food security and high-quality products is increasing. We have all the resources to meet these demands by offering eco-friendly and sustainable solutions. Efficient grain processing is a foundation for development!

featuresLayout5.headingTitle: Grain Product Supply for Manufacturers and Entrepreneurs!
featuresLayout5.headingDesc: Our factory operates with the latest technologies, ensuring efficient and sustainable production. We also have a strong logistics system for global delivery.

featureItems.title: Grain Cleaning Service
featureItems.desc: Modern technologies are used in our factory for cleaning, sorting, and preparing grain. Product quality is our top priority.

featureItems.title: Milling Service
featureItems.desc: We produce high-quality flour and groats using innovative equipment. Our goal is consistent quality and customer-oriented products.

featureItems.title: Packaging and Storage
featureItems.desc: We have hygienic and safe warehouses for storing quality products. High standards are maintained during the packaging process.

featureItems.title: Logistics and Delivery
featureItems.desc: We provide fast and reliable global delivery services, fully supporting shipping, customs clearance, and related processes.

bannerLayout4.headingTitle: New Energy: Sustainable and Reliable Food Systems
bannerLayout4.headingDesc: In recent years, the demand for grain products has rapidly increased. We have sufficient financial and technical capacity to expand and collaborate with new markets. Our products are manufactured to meet both local and international market requirements.

infoBoxes.title: Cost Efficiency
infoBoxes.desc: Enhance the value of your products by purchasing high-quality flour and groats.

infoBoxes.title: 5-Star Service
infoBoxes.desc: We provide great attention to our clients and build strong partnerships with them.

workingSteps.subtitle: How We Work? Step 1
workingSteps.title: Inquiry or Order
workingSteps.desc: Contact us and we’ll find the best solution for you. Our specialists will analyze your requirements.

workingSteps.subtitle: How We Work? Step 2
workingSteps.title: Signing the Agreement
workingSteps.desc: We fully control every stage from delivery to equipment installation. This ensures your grain processing system meets production needs.

workingSteps.subtitle: How We Work? Step 3
workingSteps.title: Sustainable Production
workingSteps.desc: Our factory operates under continuous quality control. We guarantee timely delivery and ongoing support for our clients.
